item.title: Pebble SDK Shipped!
item.description:
Finally, a rough alpha SDK is in the wild without the hindrance of an NDA.

www.isPebbleSDKShipping.com

and its API have been updated accordingly.

Update:

After keeping my satire site up for a few years, I’ve pulled the plug. I hope you enjoyed it.

item.title: Hot Damn!
item.description:
I’m Joseph Lust.

I do many interesting and curious things. I’ve resisted the “weblog” or so called “blog” movement for some time, mainly due to aversion to the bastardization of the English language that is the word “blog”. However, the bastards have won, and it’s high time I got my thoughts online, as they might benefit others.

Unlike most WordPress blogs that run the default theme and never see more than one post, this one will.
